ECCategory.Name: Customer
ECCategory.QueryEC: Select Distinct @DimPoolId as DimPoolId , @DimECId as DimECId , dc.DimCustomerID as DimCustomerID , dc.$filedName$ FROM dbo.tblFactLoanCustomer flc Inner Join dbo.tblDimCustomer dc On dc.DimCustomerID = flc.DimCustomerID" And flc.DimReportingDateId = @DimReportingDateId" And flc.DimOrganisationID = @DimOrganisationID"

QueryECResult.Description: 查询排除后的结果模板

ECCategory.QueryECResult: Select fcec.DimPoolID , fcec.DimECID , fcec.DimCustomerID , dc.[OrganisationCode] , dc.[Name] , dc.$filedName$ FROM dbo.tblFactCustomerECResult fcec Inner join dbo.tblDimCustomer as dc On dc.DimCustomerID = fcec.DimCustomerID Where fcec.DimECId = @DimECId And fcec.DimPoolId = @DimPoolId

ECCategory.Name: Product
ECCategory.QueryEC: Select Distinct @DimPoolId as DimPoolId , @DimECId as DimECId , dl.DimLoanID as DimLoanID , dl.$filedName$ FROM dbo.tblFactLoan as fl Inner Join dbo.tblDimLoan as dl On dl.DimLoanID = fl.DimLoanID And fl.DimReportingDateId = @DimReportingDateId And fl.DimOrganisationID = @DimOrganisationID

QueryECResult.Description: 查询排除后的结果模板

ECCategory.QueryECResult: Select dsfl.DimLoanId , dsfl.TrustID , dsfl.AccountNo , dsfl.ReportingDate , dsdl.$filedName$ FROM dbo.tblFactLoanECResult flec Inner join dbo.tblDimLoan dsdl On dsdl.DimLoanId = flec.DimLoanId Inner join dbo.tblFactLoan dsfl On dsfl.DimLoanId = flec.DimLoanId And dsfl.DimOrganisationId = @DimOrganisationId And dsfl.DimReportingDateId = @DimReportingDateId Where flec.DimECId = @DimECId And flec.DimPoolId = @DimPoolId
